At 12th level, your form grows more twisted and powerful while bloodraging, but clumsy, blind aggression clouds your mind. Your morale bonus to Strength increases by 2, and you gain low-light vision and darkvision (60 feet), but you take a â€“2 penalty to both Dexterity and Wisdom for the duration of your bloodrage.

At 16th level, you apply your morale bonus on Will saving throws while bloodraging to Fortitude and Reflex saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.
